greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of trailing 0's in tribonacci representation of n (cf. A278038).
comment: The number mod 3 of trailing 0's in the tribonacci representation of n  >= 1 (this sequence mod 3) is the tribonacci word itself (A080843). - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 04 2018
The number of trailing 1's in the tribonacci representation of n >= 0 (cf. A278038) is also the tribonacci word itself (A080843).
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 18 2016
